blocks.headline: Editorial Workflows
blocks.text: Review, approve, and manage content changes using version control

features.headline: Branches & Pull Request
features.text: When creating new branches, Tina will automatically create a related new Pull Request.

features.headline: Protect Branches
features.text: Integer posuere erat a ante venenatis dapibus posuere velit aliquet. Fusce dapibus, tellus ac cursus commodo, tortor mauris condimentum nibh, ut fermentum massa justo sit amet risus.

features.headline: Shareable Previews
features.text: Easily get to your preview on Netlify, Vercel, AWS, etc. This allows editors to easily share their site preview with other stakeholders.

blocks.headline: Elevate your content production process.
blocks.text: Get started with TinaCMS's superior editorial workflow now.

blocks.content:
## Publish with Confidence

### Create content with branches and Pull Requests in a user-friendly CMS interface without going to GitHub.

Review and manage your team's content changes with a robust workflow

seo.title: Superior Editorial Workflow with TinaCMS
seo.description: Efficiently manage and review your team's content changes through an integrated Git workflow. Optimize your content production with TinaCMS.
